data.text: Chuny ruoth ni e lwet Jehova Nyasaye,
Yore duto mag dhano nenorene ni nikare,
Timo gima kare kod mowinjore
Wangʼ teko, chuny mar sunga
Chenro mag ngʼat matiyo matek kelo ohala
Mwandu moyudi gi lep mariambo
Timbe mahundu mar joricho biro terogi mabor magilal;
Yor ngʼat ma jaketho ogondore,
Ber dak e kona mar wi ot
Ngʼat ma timbene richo ohero richo;
Ka okum ngʼat ma jaro ji, to joma ngʼeyogi tin yudo rieko,
Ngʼat Makare ongʼeyo od ngʼat ma timbene richo
Ka ngʼato odino ite ne ywak mar jachan,
Mich mochiw lingʼ-lingʼ kweyo mirima
Ka adiera onenore, to joma timbegi nikare bedo mamor
Ngʼat moweyo yor winjo wach
Ngʼat mohero budho biro bedo jachan;
Jomaricho bedo resruok mar joma kare;
Ber dak e thim motwo
Od ngʼat mariek opongʼ kod chiemo gi moo moyier,
Ngʼatno maluwo tim makare kod hera
Ngʼat mariek kawo dala ngʼat maratego
Ngʼatno marito dhoge kod lewe
Ngʼat ma jasunga kendo jawuorre “Jajaro” e nyinge;
Dwaro mar jasamuoyo biro bedo thone owuon;
Odiechiengʼ duto odwaro mangʼeny,
Misango mar jaricho ok ber,
Janeno ma ja-miriambo biro lal;
Ngʼat ma jaricho wangʼe tek
Onge rieko, onge neno matut,
Inyalo yiko faras ne ndalo mar lweny;
